mods:mods.mods:abstract: England has agreed that independence will be recognized immediately and without making it the condition of a general peace. This offer should be communicated to America. Advantages to America of this offer. It is inconceivable that America will continue efforts under French direction. "We" should not try to cause dissension in the colonies or even separate America unhonorably from France. They must be convinced that the object of this country is not merely peace, but reconciliation with America. June 28 (in French). The basis of the general peace consists in a general and reciprocal restitution on the part of all the belligerent powers of all that was captured during the war. An exception to this rule is the 13 colonies of North America, where absolute independence is recognized.
